body: @yinghai I don't insist we should remove this in this PR. We can keep this weight cache for now. But I do think the API for creating models should be the same regardless of the backend devices the models run with, not a problem of whether a backend is new or not. With this "training_mode" flag, users have to explicitly modify their training models so as to run on MKL-DNN optimized backend, right?
